column1: [Highlight] Raul Neto forces the turnover, hustles to save the ball from going out of bounds, establishes himself inbounds to get the ball, and finds Troy Brown Jr. for the bucket
Raul Neto in a win vs the Denver Nuggets: 15 points (5-10, 1-3 from 3), 4 assists, and a career high 5 steals!
We are having an argument. Is TNT crew right when they say that the play in [0:15] is wrongly called. Is this a turnover by Raul Neto?
[Highlight] Raul Neto goes flying in an attempt to sell the push off by Gary Trent Jr.
"Give Me That Shit" - Ricky Rubio steals the ball from Raul Neto and talks shit afterwards.

[Katz] Bradley Beal (right hip contusion) is questionable for tonight, the Wizards say. Daniel Gafford has a right ankle sprain and is OUT. Raul Neto (left rib contusion, which he’s been dealing with) is questionable, again.
Rubio "Give Me That Shit" talks shit after getting the steal on Raul Neto.
With the exception of 2 FTs by Raul Neto, Russell Westbrook scored or assisted every point the Wizards scored in the second quarter
[Post Game Thread] The Washington Wizards (31-36) defeat the Toronto Raptors (27-40) in OT, 128 - 126 behind a clutch performance from Raul Neto
[Highlight] Raul Neto nearly steals the inbound with 2.5 seconds left in the game
[Charania] Free agent guard Raul Neto has agreed to a deal to return to the Washington Wizards, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium.
Knicks interested in Raul Neto? | HoopsHype
[Charania] Free agent guard Raul Neto has agreed to a deal to return to the Washington Wizards, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium.
[Mayo] True Wizards fans will enjoy this quote: "I’m a point guard but last year I played the two, three, sometimes even the four." - Raul Neto
Raul Neto, October 22 vs Indiana: 18 PTS, 3 AST, 3 REB, 7/11 FG, 2 STL, 1 BLK, 29 MIN Off the Bench
